General.Name: E&E Recycling
General.Description: E&E Recycling,Inc. provides recycling and treatment of waste electric household appliances in Asia. The company treats waste household appliances, such as televisions, air-conditioners, refrigerators, washing machines, and fans; and waste information items, including host computers, monitors, liquid crystal displays, keyboards, printers, and laptops. It also sells various treatment equipment, such as waste household appliance treatment, waste PCB treatment, CRT funnel glass cleanness, CRT treatment, and freon recovery systems, as well as derivatives; and provides operation management services. E&E Recycling,Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
